steps.text: You enter a forgotten library in the old city. A strange force pulls you toward a shelf. A black-cloth-wrapped book lies pulsing softly in the corner.
You unwrap the book. It’s titled 'The Cursed City Palace of Jaipur'. The pages are blank. You try to close it, but it flips open on its own.
The page reads: 'You wanted the cursed City Palace. I’ll take you there.' Your body rises. Wind howls. A vortex forms — you’re sucked in.
You land at Mubarak Mahal under a moonlit sky. The palace is silent. You feel eyes watching.

choices.text: Walk into the shadows behind you
choices.death: Death — dragged into the darkness by spirits of old pehredaars.

steps.text: You walk toward the Crafts Demonstration Area. Tools clang… but no one’s there. You hear whispers in Marwari.

choices.death: Death — you mispronounce something in Marwari and are struck by a flying mace.

choices.text: Step back slowly and cross to Sileh Khana

steps.text: You reach Sileh Khana. Weapons float and clash mid-air. Ghostly officers duel. One turns and stares at you.

choices.text: Try to speak to the officer
choices.death: Death — executed by flying swords.

steps.text: You enter Diwan-i-Aam. The throne is empty, but footsteps surround you.

choices.text: Kneel and pretend to be a servant
choices.death: Death — trampled by ghost nobles.

choices.text: Crawl behind the pillar and hide

steps.text: The ghost of an English officer laughs from the throne. 'The Maharaja never left,' he snarls.

choices.death: Death — hung from ceiling by invisible rope.

steps.text: You’re near Rajendra Pol. The gates bleed. Two Silver Urns glimmer beside.

choices.death: Death — cursed arrow to the heart.

steps.text: Inside the urn, you find a lighter. You flick it on. An inscription reads: 'Above the moon, beyond the fire — the mantra lies on Chandra’s spire.' 'Speak it to awaken the sleeping gods.'

choices.death: Death — urn melts and seals you alive.

choices.text: Commit the mantra clue to memory

steps.text: The palace shakes slightly. A chant echoes from afar.

choices.death: Death — shadow arms yank you from above.

steps.text: You step out and find a cracked idol of Ganesh near the gate.

choices.text: Try to pry off the gem in its forehead
choices.death: Death — cursed flames erupt.

steps.text: You reach Ridhi Sidhi Pol. The arch pulses with strange red light.

choices.death: Death — skull cracked open by a child’s spirit.

steps.text: You reach Pritam Chowk — four season-painted doors. All slam shut, then one creaks open.

choices.death: Death — fall into fire pit.

steps.text: Inside is a mirror room. Your reflection doesn’t match you.

choices.death: Death — pulled into mirror world.

steps.text: You fall through a hidden chute into a chamber of whispers.

choices.text: Chant 'Om Namah Shivaya' to calm them

choices.death: Death — swarm of ghost dogs devour you.

steps.text: The whispers vanish. A dead Marwari worker appears, holding out a key.

choices.death: Death — your hand rots instantly.

steps.text: You use the key on a locked room. Inside: a floating conch.

choices.death: Death — ears explode from silent scream.

steps.text: A stairway appears leading up, carved into the wall.

choices.text: Light your way with the lighter

choices.death: Death — fall into a deep stone chamber.

steps.text: The walls are painted with war scenes. The eyes of painted soldiers move.

choices.death: Death — paintings animate and needles impale your eyes.

steps.text: You reach a small shrine with a half-burned diya.

choices.death: Death — darkness consumes you.

steps.text: You ascend Chandra Mahal. The halls twist unnaturally.

choices.death: Death — lost in endless loop.

steps.text: A royal woman glides past, humming a lullaby. She’s headless.

choices.death: Death — she screams your soul away.

steps.text: A wall ahead is covered in Sanskrit — part of the mantra.

choices.death: Death — cursed ink blinds you.

steps.text: The wind picks up violently. A voice says, 'Only the pure heart may pass.'

choices.text: Bow down and ask to be forgiven

choices.death: Death — crushed by invisible mace.

steps.text: A door blocks the rooftop. It requires a sacrifice.

choices.text: Offer a drop of your blood

choices.death: Death — rejected and thrown down the stairs.

steps.text: You step onto the rooftop. The full moon shines. The final mantra is inscribed on a stone.

choices.death: Death — palace collapses onto you.

steps.text: The spirits scream. The ground shakes. Light bursts from the sky.

choices.death: Death — sucked into the clouds of spirits.

steps.text: You rise into the sky. The vortex returns. Faces of the cursed reach for you.

choices.text: Fold hands and offer them peace

choices.death: Death — pulled into eternal torment.

steps.text: You wake up in the library. The book is closed beside you. One drop of blood stains the page. You survived.
